Slap Kings

Brief: Prepare your hand for some fiery action in "Slap Kings," a game that combines humor, simple mechanics, and competitive slapping contests! Step into the arena and be crowned the ultimate champion of slap tournaments, where timing and power are the keys to overcome a variety of quirky opponents.
